about.title: About Our Platform
about.description1: was founded with a simple but powerful mission: to make development more accessible, efficient, and enjoyable for teams of all sizes.
about.description2: Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive design, enabling developers to focus on what matters most—building exceptional software that solves real problems.
about.description3: Whether you're a startup or an enterprise, our scalable solutions grow with you, providing the tools and support you need at every stage of your journey.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you and your team. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for individuals and small teams getting started

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For growing teams needing more power and features
pro.features: Unlimited team members,100GB storage,Advanced analytics,Priority support,Custom domains,API access

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with advanced requirements
enterprise.features: Unlimited everything,500GB storage,Enterprise analytics,Dedicated support,Custom integrations,SLA guarantees

newsletter.description: Get the latest updates, news, and exclusive content delivered to your inbox.

success.title: Thank you for subscribing!
success.message: You've been added to our mailing list. Watch your inbox for updates!

i18n.title: Date & Time Formatting with TimeZone
i18n.description: This page demonstrates the internationalization features including time zone support.
i18n.footer: All date and time formatting in this application is powered by next-intl and configured to use the {timezone} timezone by default. This ensures consistency across the application and prevents markup mismatches caused by environment differences.
